channel.title: Instant Error On Every Client?
channel.description: Ok so it starts off like this, i look for a server to go on, found 2 servers that looked good with heaps of good info and so on, but they required a client to play, so i downloaded the client, opened it, typed user and pass, and an INSTANT and i mean hardly a milisecond, just pops up 'Error connecting to server'. so i looked at the mopars server status page again and waited till it updated to see if tht server was down or not, the answer was NO it was still on, but i still yet get errors rapidly like that... so i tried my second found server and the SAME THING happens. but the odd thing is, a server, Flamepkz has a client WHICH I CAN go on easily without getting those errors! so is there like, something i gotta edit in the run.bat files in the clients that i have a problem with? if so, please do say so.

item.title: Instant Error On Every Client?
item.dc:creator: @Dlora942 Dlora942
item.description:
@Dlora942 wrote:

so what ur saying is, these 2, actually now becoming THREE servers i go on which have clients are crappy?

Read full topic

item.title: Instant Error On Every Client?
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

No, the server is just crappy.
You don’t have to edit it.
Calm down.

Read full topic

item.title: Instant Error On Every Client?
item.dc:creator: @Dlora942 Dlora942
item.description:
@Dlora942 wrote:

i said if i have to edit it in some way, say so, not if i dont have to u idiot, gee some1 warn this guy, hes been spamming random crap almost on every topic

ok edited this post, ONLY IF YOU HAVE A SOLUTION then post, if NOT, DONT.

Read full topic

item.title: Instant Error On Every Client?
item.dc:creator: @Dlora942 Dlora942
item.description:
@Dlora942 wrote:

Ok so it starts off like this, i look for a server to go on, found 2 servers that looked good with heaps of good info and so on, but they required a client to play, so i downloaded the client, opened it, typed user and pass, and an INSTANT and i mean hardly a milisecond, just pops up ‘Error connecting to server’. so i looked at the mopars server status page again and waited till it updated to see if tht server was down or not, the answer was NO it was still on, but i still yet get errors rapidly like that… so i tried my second found server and the SAME THING happens. but the odd thing is, a server, Flamepkz has a client WHICH I CAN go on easily without getting those errors! so is there like, something i gotta edit in the run.bat files in the clients that i have a problem with? if so, please do say so.

Read full topic
